== Distribution ==
== Distribution ==

+
[[Image:GIMP_windows_screenshot.png|thumb|GIMP 2.4.5 running on Windows Vista]]
GIMP is available for a variety of [[operating system]]s and [[computer architecture]]s. There are a number of variations and derivative programs, including [[porting|port]]s to other operating systems and forks with task- or OS-specific modifications. The GIMP website does not distribute [[compiler|compiled]] versions of GIMP, only the project's [[source code]].
